But today B&H has a 24GB M4 MacBook Pro at $400 off the list price.

items.title: Verge staffers react to the iPhone Air: what we love and don’t love
items.summary: Determined to give us something new to talk about, Apple has introduced its ultra-thin iPhone Air. It's just 5.6mm thick with a 6.5-inch ProMotion display, a 48-megapixel dual camera, a selfie camera that supports Center Stage, and an add-on MagSafe battery. Among other things. We asked the staff of The Verge for their first impressions […]

items.title: The iPhone 17 Pro’s orange is good — and well timed
items.summary: Apple just announced arguably its boldest Pro iPhone color ever: the new "cosmic orange" for the iPhone 17 Pro. And to my surprise, I think it looks really good. In choosing a bold hue as its hero shade for the iPhone 17 Pro, Apple also seems to have nailed one of the season's hottest colors. […]

items.title: EGO’s modular Nexus power station with two 7.5Ah batteries can also refuel your arsenal at $899 (Reg. $1,099)
items.summary:
At Amazon, you can currently find the EGO Power+ Nexus Portable Power Station with two 7.5Ah batteries at $899 shipped. This bundled package usually runs for $1,099 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen keeping down near $999 with discounts. While these drops to $899 are usually rare sightings, the price has been holding out strong since mid-August, with no telling how much longer it may last. Aside from the $838 low we saw once back during Black Friday, you’re otherwise looking at the best tracked price, which saves you $200 off the going rate. If you already have a collection of EGO ARC batteries, you can pick the station up on its own for $593.

more…

items.title: Apple To Launch iOS 26, watchOS 26, iPadOS 26 On 15 September
items.summary:
Following the conclusion of Apple’s keynote event, the company has officially announced that iOS 26, the next major update for iPhones, will officially launch on 15 September. One of the most noticeable changes is the introduction of Liquid Glass design as well as redesigned app icons, to name a few. However, as usual with any […]

items.title: Microsoft to lessen reliance on OpenAI by buying AI from rival Anthropic

items.title: JBL’s waterproof and dustproof Boombox 3 keeps the party going for up to 24 hours at $380 (Reg. $500)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the JBL Boombox 3 Portable Bluetooth Speaker at $380.23 shipped. You’d usually be shelling out $500 for this speaker at full price, which has been regularly spending time down at $400 throughout 2025. We did spot it dropping to $360 and $340 last month in Prime-exclusive deals, though if you missed out on those rates, you can pick it up today at the same price we saw during July’s Prime Day event. All-in-all, this is a 24% markdown that cuts $120 off the going rate and lets you go BIG with all your portable audio needs.

items.title: Sticking with Series 9 or older? This black stainless steel Apple Watch band is only $12.50
items.summary:
Fullmosa Black Stainless Steel Apple Watch Band

Buy for $12.50 (Reg. $17)

Clip the on-page 26% off coupon.

What we love

For a while, it felt like Apple Watch was one of those devices you needed to upgrade every year or two. Mainly because the power was lacking. Over the last few generations, that has become less of an issue with performance being enough to handle most of the quick interactions I personally use. So if you’re sticking with Series 9 or older, this band may be worth adding to your collection at just $12.50.

Buy for $24.50 (Reg. $34)

We’ve seen loads of gear with retractable USB-C cables show up over the last year or so, and you’re looking at Anker’s take on a car charger that has one. Not only that, you’ll also find a Type-C port in tow as well. The retractable cord can hit 45W, and the port can reach 30W, for a combined total of 75W.

items.summary:
ORIA 46-in-1 Precision Screwdriver Set

Buy for $14.50 (Reg. $19)

Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

What we love

This affordable tool kit from ORIA wields more than 40 magnetic bits, all of which fit inside of the included storage case. The entire kit is designed to be incredibly compact, measuring just 5.8 by 1.5 by 1.5 inches in size. I bought an iFixit kit a while back and despite having roughly the same amount of bits, it’s a whole lot larger than this one.

items.title: JBL’s Flip 7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker with interchangeable accessories is back to $100 low
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on audio gear, Woot is now offering JBL’s Flip 7 portable Bluetooth speaker in blue for $99.95 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This model debuted back in April with a $150 price tag, and today’s deal knocks $50 off, bringing it back down to the lowest price we tracked before the recent Prime Day sale. Unlike last time, though, even the black and red variants are down to $100 low today, making this a great time to cash in and pick between a few color options. For comparison, Amazon still has it listed at the full $150, so be sure to jump in and lock in the discounted prices at Woot.

more…
